alert.note: Alert for Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 9:40PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Camden, southwestern Glynn, southeastern Brantley and northeastern Charlton Counties through 1045 PM EDT... At 939 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Nahunta to near Folkston. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Woodbine, Nahunta, Hickox, Waverly, Waynesville, Atkinson, Tarboro and Colesburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
